verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>"Command<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> to you <S%H2134>clear<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> from <S%H3795>beaten<s%> <S%H2132>olives<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> to make a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> <S%H5927>burn<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

<S%H4480>"Outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H6186>keep<s%> it in <S%H6186>order<s%> from <S%H6153>evening<s%> to <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8548>continually;<s%> [it shall be] a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
"He shall <S%H6186>keep<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> on the <S%H2889>pure<s%> [gold] <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> and <S%H644>bake<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> with it; two-tenths [of an ephah] shall be [in] <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H2471>cake.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H7760>set<s%> them [in] <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4635>rows,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> [to] a <S%H4635>row,<s%> on the <S%H2889>pure<s%> [gold] <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> on each <S%H4635>row,<s%> that it may be a <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H234>portion<s%> for the <S%H3899>bread,<s%> [even] an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Every <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H6186>set<s%> it in <S%H6186>order<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8548>continually;<s%> it is an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And it shall be for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> for it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to him from the Lord's <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire,<s%> [his] <S%H2706>portion<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"

Now the <S%H1121>son<s%> of an <S%H3482>Israelite<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> whose <S%H1121>father<s%> <S%H376><s%> was an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H3482>Israelite<s%> woman's <S%H1121>son<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3481>Israel<s%> <S%H5327>struggled<s%> with each other in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H3482>Israelite<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6895>blasphemed<s%> the <S%H8034>Name<s%> and <S%H7043>cursed.<s%> So they <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> (Now his mother's <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H9609>Shelomith,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1704>Dibri,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>)
And they <S%H5117>put<s%> him in <S%H4929>custody<s%> so that the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> might be <S%H6567>made<s%> <S%H6567>clear<s%> to them.
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3318>"Bring<s%> the one who has <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H413>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and let <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H8085>heard<s%> him <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on his <S%H7218>head;<s%> then let <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7275>stone<s%> him.

"And you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>'If<s%> <S%H376>anyone<s%> <S%H7043>curses<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> then he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

'Moreover, the one who <S%H5344>blasphemes<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7275>certainly<s%> <S%H7275>stone<s%> him. The <S%H1616>alien<s%> as well as the <S%H249>native,<s%> when he <S%H5344>blasphemes<s%> the <S%H8034>Name,<s%> shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

'And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5221>takes<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H5315>being,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
'And the one who <S%H5221>takes<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of an <S%H929>animal<s%> shall <S%H9608>make<s%> it <S%H9608>good,<s%> <S%H5315>life<s%> for <S%H5315>life.<s%>

'And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>injures<s%> <S%H9249><s%> his <S%H5997>neighbor,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as he has <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> to him:

<S%H7667>fracture<s%> for <S%H7667>fracture,<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth;<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as he has <S%H5414>injured<s%> <S%H9249><s%> a <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> it shall be <S%H5414>inflicted<s%> on him.

'Thus the one who <S%H5221>kills<s%> an <S%H929>animal<s%> shall <S%H9608>make<s%> it <S%H9608>good,<s%> but the one who <S%H5221>kills<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
'There shall be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4941>standard<s%> for you; it shall be for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> as well as the <S%H249>native,<s%> for I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>' "

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they <S%H3318>brought<s%> the one who had <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H413>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> and <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones.<s%> Thus the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
